website_summaries.verdict: This is a low-cost safety shirt made of moisture-wicking mesh. For the budget conscious, it could be a good choice.
pros: Smaller sizes come two per pack, which can save money
cons: The material is so thin that some will feel compelled to wear an undershirt, defeating the purpose of the lightweight fabric

customer_reviews.title: Bright but transparent
customer_reviews.text: These are nice for my guys to wear while doing roadside assistance during the hot summer months. They are lightweight, bright and reflective. The only thing I don't really like about them is that they are very transparent. They are so thin that you can see nipples through them. You are forced to wear an undershirt beneath them.
customer_reviews.author: TLM

customer_reviews.title: Great Work Shirt
customer_reviews.text: I live in Texas and the heat certainly climbs in the summer. The construction of these shirts wicks away the sweat better than any work shirt I have owned and keeps me cool; Much more so than a cotton T-Shirt has in the past. They are very durable and VERY visible at night (as they should be). 30+ washes and the reflectiv strips are still bright. Size!!! To put it simply; they are not relaxed fit. I wear an XL and the XL fits just fine, but don't push it. Get a comfortable size for you. Was my review helpful? Please let Amazon know. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Critically Criticizing

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE! They have super-sized their sizing. I purchased these same shirts previously about two years ago. They fit perfect. I purchased new ones about 2 months ago, figuring I'd open them when these finally wore out. A month after I purchased them ( no longer returnable), I finally needed to open them up- they were a full 1 1/2 inch longer in the sleeves, length and chest. I am swimming in them. So disappointed. If anyone wants mine (only one is open) I'll sell you them for five bucks less than these guys.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P Hackl

customer_reviews.title: Favorite work shirts
customer_reviews.text: Husband found 1 of these shirts at a local work gear place last season and had to find them online this year because they're his favorite for work. He works on a road crew doing paving or pipe-work and says they're a lot easier than wearing a high-vis vest on top & they're a pretty light shirt. Fair warning though, my hubby has a pretty flat stomach, but the reflective band that goes across the stomach is... not tight, but not stretchy either... so just be aware that if you have a not-so-flat stomach, it might affect you (I do not know this, though).
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Palmer

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased and very happy with this shirt as is my ...
customer_reviews.text: At a rather advanced age of 78 yo. I started walking for exercise. Since I live in the desert Southwest where the summer temps reach 120 F I walk early in the mornings when it has cooled to the low 80s just before dawn. I bought this shirt to be visible to the drivers who are going to work or to the job site at 6 or 7 AM. The first set of head lights that hit the shirt made the thing almost glow. I am pleased and very happy with this shirt as is my wife. (G)
customer_reviews.author: MikenAJ

customer_reviews.title: but the stripe has no stretch and it's more comfortable if you get a size larger than you normally ...
customer_reviews.text: The size might be fairly accurate in a non-reflective version of this shirt, but the stripe has no stretch and it's more comfortable if you get a size larger than you normally would. The neck opening is centered instead of being set slightly forward, so the neckline will be high in the front and the pocket is nearly in your armpit instead of out on your chest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but...
customer_reviews.text: Husband's purchase. He loves the feel of the shirt and how lightweight it is. He wore on an 80 degree day and loved it. I washed it....and now there are snags and pulls all over the shirt. One wash. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Laborer Approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband so he wouldn't have to wear a safety vest over a work short. This keeps him much cooler and more comfortable at work. We have already washed them a dozen times (at least) and they've held up perfectly. The only reason they didn't get a 5 star review is that they are a tad itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Thrill peeker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shirt .
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE !! Shirt fit very well . I usually wear a 2X pocket tee shirt when not working in a construction area .I purchased this shirt in a 2X but had to send it back because of it being too tight . I ordered the 3X and it fits much better so be aware of this when ordering .
customer_reviews.author: docshovel39

customer_reviews.title: Great except for stains
customer_reviews.text: With the yellow ones no matter how much stain removal stuff that I do the stains actually seem to look worse other than that love it we got some orange ones to those you can wash and the stains may not all come out but you know their work shirts but at least it doesn't look worse because you tried to get stains out so definitely sticking with orange from now on
customer_reviews.author: J&K Strong

customer_reviews.title: Good Breathable Material, but the Reflective Stripes do not stretch
customer_reviews.text: The shirt size is fine, a true XL. The shirt material is very breathable. But the reflective stripes don't move or stretch at all, so the one right around his rib cage makes him feel like he is wearing a girdle when he is moving around on the job. Maybe buying a size larger would help with the issue of the reflective stripes.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Not A terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Shirt isn’t that light weight. It may feel like it but it will definitely make you hotter and sweat more but i do like more then a vest. The size was a lot wider then i thought it would be but i can live with it. The grey tape part is starting to get small holes in it already and i pry only wear it 2-3 times A month
customer_reviews.author: kenny215

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1 size larger
customer_reviews.text: Like these a lot. They do snag, but I always seem to have that happen on shirts like this no matter who makes them. But I would say they are just a little bit on the small side, and I would order them 1 size larger for comfort if you aren't built like a long distance runner...
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Carter

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Completely see through. If you have any chest hair, don't bother with this, you'll look like a wooly mammoth on the job site. Runs small too. Speaking of runs, the material gets runs in it from dry skin. Ever met a construction guy w/out dry skin? Yeah me either.
customer_reviews.author: Esquire

customer_reviews.title: Pocket placement
customer_reviews.text: Look very carefully at the picture. the pocket for this shirt is the armpit. It makes the pocket useless and looks stupid!!
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoDave

customer_reviews.title: Very nice safety Tee’s
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my job as I work as a field service mechanic for the utilities department. They are very visible during daylight hours and very reflective after hours of darkness. I certainly feel safer wearing these than I did before.
customer_reviews.author: Grayline69

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Sticking with orange... With the yellow ones no matter how much stain removal stuff that I do the stains actually seem to look worse other than that love it we got some orange ones to those you can wash and the stains may not all come out but you know their work shirts but at least it doesn't look worse.
customer_reviews.author: J&K Strong

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like a regular tee shirt.
customer_reviews.text: I wear this while riding my bike for long distances each weekend. Regular tee shirts became saturated and didn't let the air through. I am noticeably more comfortable wearing this shirt. I already bought a long sleeve one for riding in the fall. I also think this shirt is brighter and more visible than my regular tee shirts. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Glisson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect great things for the great price.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t expect too much for the price. Good before you wash them a couple of times they’ll start to unravel at the bottom and stitching around the reflective strips, lots of loose threads everywhere but still going strong for work. Hold grease stains like a grudge. But they’re for work right. There’s one annoying problem though, the left pocket is a little too far to the left. If you put things in it migrates under your armpit.
customer_reviews.author: Donald P.

customer_reviews.title: Cool & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Much more cool & comfortable versus a vest over a normal T shirt or uniform. We get a couple of these, almost identical just a different brand, through work every year or so, but 2 isn’t enough to rotate all week so I’ve bought these myself for years. Great quality, perfect for Florida heat.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Crumbs

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is light weight and the hi-vis is hi-vis. My issue with the shirt is the pocket. I don’t know who decided where to put the pocket, but it ends up being under your armpit. So it’s basically useless. Unless you like being poked with your pens. Wouldn’t buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Walter

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: light weight breathable and a great price. For my profession working in a rock quarry I cant see paying top dollar for a shirt that will most likly get oil and dirt on it on a daily basis. Its been 6 months of using these shirts 1-2 times a week on a weekly basis depending on laundry schedual. They are stained but all the seams are still in tact. will be buying more soon.
customer_reviews.author: kH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blend of comfort and safety
customer_reviews.text: This neon-bright safety shirt is both comfortable and practical. Can be worn with underclothing in cold weather and solo in the warm. The highly reflective stripes shine brightly even in dim light. I strongly reccommend this item for anyone in the warehouse of construction business
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Sweaty and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a job that required safety shirts. After an hour they feel like turtleneck sweaters. They have threads that come loose and stain easily. They do not dry out quickly. Not good for a job with high temps. i wore a cotton t that was bright green and sweated much less with those shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Son loves these, ordering couple more. Working outdoors in hot, humid Midwest, my son says these the best for breathability. Not a heavy shirt, perfect for summer wear.
customer_reviews.author: retiredRN

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Good if youre on a budget. Not terribly flexible. They serve the purpose of viability and keeping cooler than wearing the vest over top. I bought some for my husband hoping to save by not getting the Carhart version. He knew instantly. He says theyre not as comfortable and the reflective strips are very stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Midna.Shadow.

customer_reviews.title: These withstood 70 hour weeks for an entire summer
customer_reviews.text: I wore these all last summer for working ramp operations at the airport. Replaced them this year only because I couldn't get the stains out. A couple have some decent snags. Almost my entire summer crew wore these last year. Nice and cool during the hot temps on the tarmac.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy S.

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's good.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad shirt for the money. I prefer Carthart shirts but I can get three for the price of one. The material is holding up and it is staying pretty clean. Only AIR DRY these shirts. DO NOT use a dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Nighttrain

customer_reviews.title: Great work shirt
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, seems to fit right. I bought medium and it fits as it should. I wore these shirts every day at work all summer, washed inside out and air dried them, they still look new. I will buy these same shirts again when I need to replace what I have.
customer_reviews.author: Ed G.

customer_reviews.title: Tight Fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits tight in the lower chest, neck, and in general. I would suggest one size bigger for regular fit and two for layering under. It felt light weight but I didn't like the feel of them and returned over size and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Jensen

customer_reviews.title: sizing is not normal sizing
customer_reviews.text: I can wear an extra large in anything .....never a problem. This product is extra tight. uncomfortable. sizing is not normal.
customer_reviews.author: linda40228

customer_reviews.title: Railroad worker approved
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for railroad workers! A summer shirt with the necessities for working outside. Comfortable, breathable and hasn’t ripped yet!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Good but have a tight neck
customer_reviews.text: I've had the same 2 shirts for about a year . I'm not wearing them everyday but I have got plenty of use out of them and they are still good to go . The neck is a little tight though and does not stretch out at all can be a little bothersome on some hot days but still a good buy. If you have a thick neck I would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Kresal

customer_reviews.title: Fits weird, junky & heavy would not ever recommend
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and very uncomfortable. Much heavier than I expected and didnt fit like normal shirt in the least. Couldn't even wear it very cheap poorly made shirt
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High visibility low durability
customer_reviews.text: Have one the shirt twice and it's already got holes in it. It went moisture fairly well in the fairly comfortable. Pockets in the wrong spot It's like way off to the side but the fabric has zero durability.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pleasants

customer_reviews.title: COOL SHIRT
customer_reviews.text: Hey hard working outdoor people, if you have to wear safety stripes in the hot outdoor summer THIS IS THE SHIRT FOR YOU! Cool, comfortable, and meets safety regulations. No need to wear t-shirt and vest. This shirt is lighter and cooler than a regular t-shirt. It came out of the laundry great, like new. Purchased several.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Nice breathable shirt. Not to sure how I feel about the reflective material that goes around you stomach. Example. I have one shirt that doesn’t connect all the way around and is very comfortable. This one connects all the way around and it kinda restricts you. But will try it out. The best thing was I ordered it on the 12th and it was on my door step on the 13th. Super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: odd
customer_reviews.text: Fits oddly. Pocket is half under armpit and the fit is just....off. Always has loose threads flying around, but it does get the job done I guess.
customer_reviews.author: celt67

customer_reviews.title: ... a couple of guys at work and they looked great out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several of these for work and for a couple of guys at work and they looked great out of the box! The problem is that they run a little bit short for my liking. I'm 6'2" so your results may vary. Even stepping up to a 2X didn't add enough length, and it put the pocket in my arm pit. The shirts I ordered for myself will be given to other shorter guys on my crew.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then I thought
customer_reviews.text: I love the shirts but I am a person that likes to wear a large shirt and I fit in and XL as well. So I decided that it might be best to get the bigger side thinking I would have a lot of room. Ya I was mistaken. The XL is made for a person that think that a large was ferfect for them with lots of room. So I think they should love an XL if ur a medium lover.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Correctly Sized Shirt
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable and well fitting shirt that I will use for cycling. The front pocket is a bonus and for once I ordered from the supplied size chart and the garment arrived in the correct fit. The high visibility and reflective bands are a great safety measure and the ventilated moisture wicking fabric will keep me cool and dry while biking.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Breeze

customer_reviews.title: nice color very hot
customer_reviews.text: sizing runs a bit small. husband usually wears a 2x, but had to order hiim a 3x in this shirt. the color looks good for now, but the shirt is very hot & not as breathable as we were expecting/ hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Incorrect sizing. A large is a snug fit. The collar is tight. Not comfortable to wear. The only thing is that it looks like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Light bright and in clear visible sight
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was cotton, polyester and my skin DONT work well together however... it serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: FRANKIE

customer_reviews.title: Runs smaller than older model
customer_reviews.text: I have had these before and loved them so I ordered these online. They ran tighter and shorter. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Judaman

customer_reviews.title: Hot and sweaty
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is made from a polyester or plastic like material. I had to wear a T shirt under it so I wouldn't sweat to death. I will keep them for the fall if I dont throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Qenergy

customer_reviews.title: Very light, and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice comfortable breathable shirt. I bought the same in a different color. I wear them so much, that I will have to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: gmann21133

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my husband and he absolutely loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he absolutely loves them! He likes wearing them to work because they absorb the sweat and for safety regulations as well. I will definitely be buying more for him again.
customer_reviews.author: freckles

customer_reviews.title: A quality work shirt
customer_reviews.text: Use these for work. I wash & wear these particular shirts twice a week & they’re holding up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Bough an Xl. Good on fit, light weight. Have to see how it holds up in the wash but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: comfortable dave

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: You will not find these shirts for less or even a comparable price in stores. My father searched multiple box stores looking for this exact product (mandatory work uniform) - he had me order another set. His co-workers were asking where he found them. Win!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Looman

customer_reviews.title: Good😊😊
customer_reviews.text: Good product made well no shrink so far about 5 washes I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: william armstrong

customer_reviews.title: But it's a great shirt and a good price
customer_reviews.text: My husband usually wears an XL. But he found this shirt to be too tight around his neck. But it's a great shirt and a good price. We are going to order the next size up next time.
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, high quality product. Especially for the cost it would be hard to find a superior product. I’ve been wearing these for years now since a vendor gave me a sample and do not buy any other brand since. Wear at least 5 days a week for work and they hold up very well
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Myer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had them for years and still love them! Best hot weather gear I’ve spent money on!
customer_reviews.author: Brock Reese

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Wear them Monday through Friday rather than a vest. Keeps you much cooler. Highly recommend. I would buy a size bigger. Mine shrunk quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: nathan t.

customer_reviews.title: Best value for wicking reflective wear
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shirts for work. He has to have a pocket and reflective tape. The wicking works wonderful. Very soft also. I bought several and they have held up to 10 washing already with no look of wear. Great value and quality
customer_reviews.author: Bird Watch

customer_reviews.title: But better then wearing a dam safety vest once it hot
customer_reviews.text: I can't really say or give much more than 3 stars . One the shirts do fit a bit small. But I want to give more but it hasn't warm up enough to wear them in my job . But my experience with polyester it can feel hot in the heat . But better then wearing a dam safety vest once it hot .
customer_reviews.author: kevin kalmbach

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these shirts. He's a union carpenter ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shirts. He's a union carpenter and loves the option to not wear a safety vest because this has full 360 degree coverage. I've bought him at least 10, but he always wants more.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Ready for comfort
customer_reviews.text: No complaints.top quality product for me.this is what I was looking to wear at work, I'm a proud UNION CARPENTER and most of the job sites require to wear a safety vest on site.not only this is going to take care of avoiding wearing a safety vest but also will be a comfort to wear especially in the summer time. I purchased 10 shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Union CARPENTER

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt
customer_reviews.text: Good shirt but was not as cool as some other brands. Shirt had some stains in the material out of the package that did not completely wash out. Probably will not buy this product again from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Bil

customer_reviews.title: Pocket is under my arm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt because it has a front pocket, but the pocket is not useful as it is actually under my arm and I cannot stick any pens in it or I will be stabbing my side with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray M.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Nice feeling, only issue is shrinkage. Don’t dry in dryer. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Dana mcd

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made but buy a size up
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large but it fits like a medium, nicely made. If you’re going to buy get a size larger than you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tater

customer_reviews.title: Quality work shirt
customer_reviews.text: Wear these about twice a week. They’ve been holding up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breathable!
customer_reviews.text: Nice work shirts. Bought 6! I turn them Inside out when washing to prolong reflector life, hopefully. Can’t beat the price either. I’m in construction and they’re perfect type 2 high visibility!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher West

customer_reviews.title: Comfort WITH A POCKET!
customer_reviews.text: Like these shirts, so much more comfortable to ware than a vest. Pocket for me is a necessity (pen and cellphone). They breath well. The only negatives are they stain easy and you need to order in a larger size. I wash in cold water and air dry them, they are holding up quite well. I didn't have to return the ones that didn't fit as my coworkers were eager to buy. Price was also very reasonable, excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Cap

customer_reviews.title: The hi vis shirt everyone needs for a safe work environment
customer_reviews.text: This hi vis work shirt is great for safety reasons at the work place. The weather has been in the upper 90's n this shirt makes it better to work bc of the breathable fabric n it's very light also I would definitely recommend this to anyone who has to wear hi vis shirts in the work place
customer_reviews.author: Joseph bartholetti

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and work well
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and have held up well through washing and my husband's job. They do stain easily, but so do all shirts this color. It is what it is, I guess! Hubby likes them because they feel cooler and don't feel wet as he sweats working outside in the summer. The price is good for the amount of shirts you're getting, also. Recommend, no cons!
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: too binding
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he tried it on. My husband has a medium build with a medium size beer belly so the reflective material doesn't have enough give.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Really makes working on the side of the road safer.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great shirts and the cost is great. Fast shipping. Really throw of the light at night when head light hit them.
customer_reviews.author: George M Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Can you see me now?
customer_reviews.text: Wore it for the first time 2 days ago...I like it! May buy a 2nd one?
customer_reviews.author: jetheridge

customer_reviews.title: Item not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Item is smaller than advertised. Shrinks when washing and drying. Stains on this item last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Duran

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great light work shirt for husband, ordered several. Wash nice also
customer_reviews.author: TLM

customer_reviews.title: great alternative to safety vests
customer_reviews.text: Had to start wearing safety vests at work about 2yrs ago hated the vets bc of the velcro on the shoulder and they kept falling off my shoulders. Purchased 3 of these and absolutely love them. I would recommend going a size bigger as I wear a large and ordered these in XL and perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The description is a little miss-leading, I took it that there would be 2 shirts per package "2 T-shirts with Moisture Wicking Mesh"
customer_reviews.author: Sharjoy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money I spent
customer_reviews.text: Thin, quality shirt. Great buy for the money I spent. Fit is true to size and the reflective striping is fully functional. Follow washing directions to maintain integrity of the reflective striping!
customer_reviews.author: Lmcguire

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These shirts make your working on the side of the road much safer. The cost is great and the shipping is fast.
customer_reviews.author: George M Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: just what you expect
customer_reviews.text: It is a lightweight, air max shirt with reflective bands. It is just what I expected and fit him well. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A Candler

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought four shirts. Have had 2 weeks. Seams on sleeves already came apart. Wont buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Reflective portion attracts sun ☀️
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with the purchase it is pretty breezy and the only issue is that the reflective material used attracts the sun 🌞 and it does get pretty uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Rich & Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: They keep you fresh in the summer
customer_reviews.text: This shirt are really confortable to wear.. they are a little bit to big for a small person I order size M, quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Elvia Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Great work shirts!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shirts! Holding up really well after heavy use in all weather! Great quality for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth buying. They are affordable and made with great quality in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: They are nice shirts. Would you consider 5XLT
customer_reviews.text: He never wore them, to work.. They are not long enough.They are nice shirts .Would you consider 5XLT. shirts They are very hard to find .He likes to tuck his shirts in. Thank-you Radians.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work shirt for men
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect work shirts for safety. My husband usually wears a large and we had to go up a size to a XL. Fits perfectly and washes nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Matassa

customer_reviews.title: Tight neck
customer_reviews.text: Served its purpose, but my husband is tall not heavy and the neck was insane tight.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for the employees where I work, they look good and stand out so traffic can see them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great work shirt, compliant with anywhere I work (I'm an industrial contractor). Much better than wearing an aggravating vest!
customer_reviews.author: JohnTaurus

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I always read the reviews before buying a product, and it seemed to me that the most common complaint was the number of washes this shirt can take before it starts to show wear and tear. My solution is to wash with my homemade laundry detergent in cold water and line dry. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff !
customer_reviews.text: Works great and highly recommended !!!! Very visible in sun light and at night. Would recommend getting a size bigger than you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Size correctly and durable
customer_reviews.text: Would purchase again..recommend to air dry(doesn't take long) My husband wears them daily so on average of 6 to 9 months constant wear and a couple dryer drys on mistake i would purchase a couple more to look fresh 🙂 The strips are still in tack and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Su jr

customer_reviews.title: shirt looked nice however the bands that go around prevent the material ...
customer_reviews.text: shirt looked nice however the bands that go around prevent the material from expanding like it does where the bands are not. Thus, you cannot get it over your head and to tight around chest..even with a size up..returned
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt, cool and comfortable and certainly does the job of making you more visible, even during the day. Great for biking in traffic or, I'm sure, would be great for anyone out walking or jogging as well. Seem to be holding up well as far as quality is concerned. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: One Day at a Time

customer_reviews.title: Pocket in wrong place
customer_reviews.text: Only real problem I have with this shirt is where pocket is it's almost under my arm
customer_reviews.author: michael mccraig

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made higher quality shirt. Just purchased a second. The neck is a bit small compared to a tee shirt so you might go up a size for more comfort.

customer_reviews.text: Um I didint get this shirt all I got the the original radwear tshirt:(

customer_reviews.title: This shirts is well made and fits great. No shrinkage after being washed and dried several ...
customer_reviews.text: This shirts is well made and fits great. No shrinkage after being washed and dried several times. I'm the hottest guy on the road crew. Thanks Radians
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGuru

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt 4 work
customer_reviews.text: Shirt good for a safety environment type job - just wish shirt pocket for pens was deeper and a little sturdier (lost pen when bent over). Otherwise good shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Teylo Meghann

customer_reviews.title: Great work shirts
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely and is conformable. Keeps me from having to wear a safety vest, which is awesome in the middle of a hot summer day. Minus 1 star for only lasting 25 wash cycles, basically means replacing them every year.
customer_reviews.author: Billy80

product_meta.title: Radians ST11-2PGS-M Industrial Safety Shirt Short Sleeve
product_meta.description:
Color:Green| Size:MediumRadians ST11 Class 2 Hi-Viz T-Shirt with Max-Dri™ Moisture Wicking Mesh is made with an arid Birdseye Mesh allowing for maximum breathability, without compromising durability. The stripes are adhered by heat transfer rather than sewn on, making the safety T-shirt wear much more like a regular T-shirt. The wicking properties improve hot weather comfort making it feel much cooler. The front pocket does not include reflective material to allow for corporate imprints. 25 wash maximum.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Radians Class 2, Max-Dry Moisture Wicking T-Shirt has one horizontal 2-Inch tape, a chest pocket and it meets the ANSI/ISEA requirements. It comes in green or orange.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
